com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.wal

Class OWALSegmentCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.wal.OWALSegmentCache

  • public class OWALSegmentCache
extends Object
    Write cache for the file which presents segment of WAL.

    The last written pages will be cached so later they can be flushed by single batch. File will be closed if there will be no access to this cache during last N min.
